title: [GAMEPLAY] Elementalist lux bug - Able to select the same element

embed.description: So uhhh.. After i died i accessed to the menu to change my element. I was able to select nature again, so i tested it. And this happened. Nature + Nature = Water gg Kappa

body:
So i was playing a game with Elementalist Lux. After a fight, i died and killed the enemy Nami. That unlocked the next element for me. The problem is that i was able to select Nature element again even if i already had it.

Out of curiosity, i tried it and it transformed me to the water form. The game considered it as a "last form" since i wasn't able to gain elemental power again.

Anyone had this bug once ?

replies.body: We gotchu - you'll have a fix for this in 7.13. <3

I already reported it, and Riot is aware.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/NU5Lh0Qj-gameplay-elementalist-lux-letting-you-choose-the-same-element-twice
Oh, i didn't saw it. Thanks for telling me :)
